name: Namasivaayam L
title: SEI | Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Results-driven Machine Learning Engineer specializing in Generative AI, Multi-Modal Systems, and Full-Stack Development. Pioneered a production-level Gemini-based solution for structured data extraction, boosting document accuracy from 9% to 90%. Led the end-to-end ML development of an LLM validation framework to benchmark in-production models against top market competitors. Experienced in building HITL, RAG, & cloud-native deployments.
